settings.kicker: Natural hair care elevated by clinical research

settings.text:
Healthy, Manageable and Vibrant Hair -

with only one change in your hair cair routine. Daily Spa-Level Hair Treatment, right at home.

settings.title: Unlike most hair care products, we don’t use water or alcohol as fillers.
This means that with every use you receive a highly concentrated dose of nourishing ingredients.

settings.name: Every ingredient in Leda Swiss products is there for a reason.

settings.title: Only nutritional ingredients carefully selected and scientifically combined to revitalize your hair.
At LEDA luxury means quality, without compromises.

settings.name: You’re not paying for water or alcohol in your hair care.
98% of Natural Origins, Free of harmful ingredients.
settings.title: A uniqe formulation of Vegan Keratin, Swiss Botanical Extracts & Rich Organic Oils
Natural hair care that actually works.

settings.name: special offer. for limited time only.
settings.title: Try it today and see the difference for yourself
settings.subtitle: All products are free from silicones, toxins, sulfates, parabens or any other harmfuls substances.

settings.title: Transform your hair care ritual with the powerful combination of LEDA Duo

settings.name: our story
settings.title: Result of dedication and passion for natural hair care
settings.text:
My mom’s dressing table was adorned with thick waxy lipsticks, rich creams in pots, and heavy scents in glass jars, creating a picture of glamour and elegance that has remained my inspiration. I never gave up on my love for cosmetics and desire for radiant hair.

Later in life, I created my own natural products free of harmful substances, which led to healthy, strong, and shiny hair. I wanted to share my invention with others which led me to over 2 years of clinical research in cooperation with the best cosmetic laboratories in Switzerland.

Over many years, applying their expertise with advanced techniques, our unique products were created, blending tradition with innovation.
settings.author: Sarah-Jane Bayliss

settings.text: I combine the Nourish Cream and Revitalise Serum, they work great when styling my hair. It looks shiny, feels smooth, and smells amazing throughout the day!
settings.name: SLAV, SWITZERLAND

settings.tab_name: How do I use LEDA Swiss products for optimal results?
settings.text: For best results, apply a small amount of Revitalise Serum to damp hair from roots to ends and style as usual. Use Nourish Cream on towel-dried hair for deep conditioning, or as a leave-in treatment to protect and smooth. Remember, a little goes a long way!For best results, apply a small amount of Revitalise Serum to damp hair from roots to ends and style as usual. Use Nourish Cream on towel-dried hair for deep conditioning, or as a leave-in treatment to protect and smooth. Remember, a little goes a long way!
